meanings.def: a collection of valuable things such as gold, silver and jewellery

examples: the priceless art treasures of the Uffizi Gallery
Many forgotten treasures have been discovered in the attics of old houses.
a vast treasure of medieval manuscripts

meanings.def: a person who is much loved or valued
examples: Liz is an absolute treasure—I couldn’t do without her.

related: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre

meanings.def: to have or keep something that you love and that is extremely valuable to you
examples: This ring is my most treasured possession.
I shall always treasure the memory of our time together.
Thank you for the watch. I will really treasure it.
memories that I will treasure for the rest of my days
